start.new_account: Account has been created successfully! Before start doing stuff with me, please read a short instruction about who I am and how I can help you 😊
start.bot_description: 🔻 My name is ■ Cube ■, let's click buttons, and look what happen 🔻 I am currently working in open beta mode and development is still in progress. If nothing, feel free to write to the Creator in the ✍️ Contact section 🔻 You can find more information about me in the About Me section 🔻 And yet I have open source!

teachers.list_of_teachers: This is list of your teachers

classmates.list_of_classmates: This is list of your classmates

search.added_movie_to_lib: ✅ I added ${title} to your collection and write you once it is released in a good quality! Continue search or get back
search.list_of_found_movies: 🔎 Here's a list of movies that I found for you! Please, choose one or specify your request
search.reason_movie_released: 🔔 This movie has been already released.
search.welcome_to_search: 🚀 Activating search engine! Just type the title in and let's go!
search.no_movies_found: 🗑 No movies were found... Try to specify your request

settings.what_to_change: What do you want to change?

contact.write_to_the_creator: 🤔 Here you can leave a message for the Creator! Be wise though, try to express your minds fully and clearly within one message!

shared.what_next: ✋ Hey, what are you up to?
shared.something_went_wrong: ❌ Something went wrong. Try one more time..

other.default_handler: 🚧 Hey, please choose a section with the Telegram keyboard before typing anything
other.support: 🤝 If you like everything and want to say thanks me and the Creator, you can do it using these options:
